resources.string: You can create and share your Events invitation here!!
Here you can see all your saved events invitation card and share your events details

Ali Hasan Rumel 
Department of CSE 
Leading University, Sylhet 
ahrumel94@yahoo.co.uk

1. For creating an event invitation Click on Create Event Invitation button.

 2.Choose from any event type Then Fill up the form.

 3.Click Preview for a quick look on the Invitation , Click Save for saving the Invitation or Click Clear for clearing all the fields.

 4.For Inviting others in the Event click on Send Invitation button after saving and Invite others to your Event via any social platform.

 5.For viewing the list of saved invitation Click View Invitations.

 6.For any kind of query and Feedback please use the Feedback option from Option Menu.

 7.For deleting any invitation Click Delete invitation button after opening an invitation.
